items.title: Treating Adolescent Obesity: Early Intervention Is Vital
items.description: With childhood obesity rates rising rapidly, addressing the problem early is increasingly important. Medscape Medical News

items.title: Pirtobrutinib Improves PFS in Treatment-Naive CLL/SLL
items.description: The noncovalent BTKi shows highly favorable progression-free survival in previously untreated chronic lymphocytic leukemia/small lymphocytic lymphoma....

items.title: Twice-Yearly Asthma Biologic Gains UK Approval
items.description: The MHRA has approved depemokimab as an add-on treatment for severe asthma and chronic rhinosinusitis with nasal polyps. Medscape News UK

items.title: Marathon Runners May Have Higher Colon Cancer Risk
items.description: A study finds that 15% of long-distance runners have advanced adenomas. Medscape Medical News

items.title: Prescribing Practices Under Scrutiny in Climate Debate
